advisory: Fungal leaf blight suspected. Apply recommended fungicide, avoid overhead irrigation, and remove infected debris.
Rust infection likely. Use resistant varieties where possible and apply suitable fungicide at early stages.
Viral mosaic symptoms suspected. Remove and destroy infected plants, control insect vectors, and avoid using saved seed.
Plants appear healthy with minor stress. Continue regular monitoring and follow good agronomic practices.
Nutrient deficiency suspected. Check soil test results and apply balanced NPK and micronutrients as recommended.
